title: Wallet: Password field contains saved data once user put it before while transaction confirmation

milestone.title: 1.27.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
### This release will be used for wide internal dogfooding 

Mobile dev team priorities In priority order:

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.26 cycle**

**2. Select which accounts to share with each Community's control node**
- Designs should be ready for review and dev feedback by 18th September

**3. Settings home screen**
- the settings home screen only

**4. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- specifically focus on bugs related to the Communities functionality, when a community is utilizing all the community admin functionality available in Status Desktop

- any remaining UX quality defects

- ensure all community token gating related functionality is working

body:
# Bug Report


## Problem 
[comment]: # (A problem description)
Password field contains saved user's password: when user goes back from transaction confirmation and then return to finish it . Also issue exist if user goes to create one more Account and before it he entered password while transaction confirmation. 

#### Expected behavior
Password field should not contain any saved data

#### Actual behavior
Password field contains saved data

### Reproduction

1.  Login with user that has tokens
2. Go to Wallet -> Send
3. Use the address of another user
4. Put the amount you want to send and Slide to send
5. Enter your password on Enter Password form
6. Do not tap Confirm and go back then Slide to send one more time

I captured a video but Password field is empty on it in terms of privacy. You can use it anyway.
Also, this video contains another issue with Confirmation, it is known and located [here](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/issues/18413) 

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/147824399/79231936-994a-4bbe-8414-d5132f05d3b0




### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 10.01.2024
- Operating System: Android, iOS


[comment]: # (Please, add logs/notes if necessary)
